General.Name: Zhe Jiang Headman Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhe Jiang Headman Machinery Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells computer numerical control machine tools. Its products are used in automobile manufacturing, construction machinery, general equipment, military, and other industries. Zhe Jiang Headman Machinery Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Taizhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Sujun  Lin
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Deputy GM
